content: the mug rug trio includes three mug rug patterns each pattern is or will soon be available as a free pattern on my website accessible from the links below https //kickincrochet com/moss-stitch-mug-rug-pattern avail 8/20 4pm pst https //kickincrochet com/eyelet-mug-rug-pattern avail 8/27 4pm pst https //kickincrochet com/diagonal-mug-rug-pattern avail 9/3 4pm pst if you d prefer to have a printable pdf one is available for purchase here on ravelry the patterns use worsted weight cotton yarn they work up quickly they make great gifts and add a quirky vibe to your home decor
